definition: The term "ganze" refers to the entirety or whole of something. It is commonly used to describe a complete or full entity, often used in the context of quantities, time, or objects.

examples.german: Ich habe den ganzen Tag gearbeitet.
Er hat das ganze Buch gelesen.
Die ganze Stadt war in Aufruhr.
examples.english: The whole city was in turmoil.

examples.german: Sie hat die ganze Nacht durchgetanzt.
